name: Auckland Institute of Studies
info: Auckland Institute of Studies (AIS) offers diploma, undergraduate, and postgraduate degrees in various fields including business, IT, and tourism.

name: Auckland University of Technology
info: Auckland University of Technology (AUT) is a contemporary university offering various programs focused on innovation and industry connections.

name: Eastern Institute of Technology
info: The Eastern Institute of Technology (EIT) offers applied degree programs in fields such as arts, business, and computing.

name: Lincoln University
info: Lincoln University is New Zealand's specialist land-based university, focusing on agriculture, horticulture, viticulture, and environmental studies.

name: Massey University
info: Massey University is known for its research-led teaching, particularly in agriculture, aviation, business, and creative arts.

name: New Zealand College of Business
info: NZCB offers specialized courses in business, accounting, and management for international students in New Zealand.

name: Toi Ohomai Institute of Technology
info: Toi Ohomai is a prominent tertiary institution, offering applied and vocational degrees across a wide range of industries.

name: UCOL Manawatū Campus
info: UCOL Manawatū Campus is known for its hands-on, practical qualifications in industries such as healthcare, trades, and business.

name: Unitec Institute of Technology
info: Unitec offers programs focused on practical, hands-on learning in fields like trades, IT, engineering, and healthcare.

name: University of Canterbury
info: The University of Canterbury is one of New Zealand's top research universities, offering degrees across engineering, law, and the arts.

name: University of Otago
info: University of Otago is known for its strong research programs, especially in health sciences, law, and the humanities.

name: University of Waikato
info: The University of Waikato offers degrees in arts, business, sciences, and has a focus on innovation and research.

name: Victoria University of Wellington
info: Victoria University of Wellington is renowned for its law, humanities, and environmental studies programs.

name: Ara Institute of Canterbury Ltd
info: Ara is one of New Zealand’s largest tertiary institutions, offering applied learning in a range of vocational programs.
